analysis.description:
Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x93f052e73bf24282a421d6b2ef16526c12a516a7.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/unique_contracts/0x93f052e73bf24282a421d6b2ef16526c12a516a7.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_owner' of EIP20.balanceOf (/unique_contracts/0x93f052e73bf24282a421d6b2ef16526c12a516a7.sol#107) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_to' of EIP20.transfer (/unique_contracts/0x93f052e73bf24282a421d6b2ef16526c12a516a7.sol#86) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of EIP20.transfer (/unique_contracts/0x93f052e73bf24282a421d6b2ef16526c12a516a7.sol#86-87) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_from' of EIP20.transferFrom (/unique_contracts/0x93f052e73bf24282a421d6b2ef16526c12a516a7.sol#94) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_to' of EIP20.transferFrom (/unique_contracts/0x93f052e73bf24282a421d6b2ef16526c12a516a7.sol#94) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of EIP20.transferFrom (/unique_contracts/0x93f052e73bf24282a421d6b2ef16526c12a516a7.sol#94-95) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_spender' of EIP20.approve (/unique_contracts/0x93f052e73bf24282a421d6b2ef16526c12a516a7.sol#108-109) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of EIP20.approve (/unique_contracts/0x93f052e73bf24282a421d6b2ef16526c12a516a7.sol#109) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_owner' of EIP20.allowance (/unique_contracts/0x93f052e73bf24282a421d6b2ef16526c12a516a7.sol#114-117) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_spender' of EIP20.allowance (/unique_contracts/0x93f052e73bf24282a421d6b2ef16526c12a516a7.sol#117) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_pender' of EIP20.pending (/unique_contracts/0x93f052e73bf24282a421d6b2ef16526c12a516a7.sol#119-120) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_pender' of EIP20.undoPending (/unique_contracts/0x93f052e73bf24282a421d6b2ef16526c12a516a7.sol#138-139) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_newOwner' of EIP20.setOwner (/unique_contracts/0x93f052e73bf24282a421d6b2ef16526c12a516a7.sol#80-81) is not in mixedCase
